704357f-a.title: Brooklyn: Flatlands Avenue - 87th Street (East)
704357f-a.text:
Flatlands Avenue, east from East 87th Street, show-
ing the W. P. A. conducting highway improvement operations
on the north side of the thoroughfare. View 3 is east
from East 88th Street.
Septemher 25, 1925
Views 1,2,3
Works Progress Administrstion
Five Boroughs Project
CREDIT LINE IRPE.A DDIVE
